participant_1.background:
I still remember the feeling of freedom I felt when I would dance in my room alone.
i spend most of my days working at my churchs food pantry.
I was once bullied so badly online that I had to delete all of my social media accounts.
I do yoga with my dog in the park every morning before work.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyer s office.

participant_2.background:
I once convinced a police officer that my skunk was a service animal so he'd let me go.
i have the gene that lets me know when someones eaten asparagus.
I remember listening to Tupac Shakur in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid.
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.
i am a drummer in an indie band.

content.text: Hi, I'm interested in learning more about you.
Cool, what would you like to know?
What's your favorite thing to do?
I love playing the drums in my indie band.
Me too! What's your favorite genre?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into hip hop and R&B right now.
Oh cool, I like those genres too. Who are some of your favorite artists?
I love Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake.
Nice! I love Kendrick Lamar too. He's so talented.
Yeah, he's one of the best. I'm also really into SZA and Solange right now.
Ooh, I love SZA! I haven't listened to Solange much, but I've heard good things about her.
You should check her out. She's really talented.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation!
